atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's `base`, `components`, `utilities` and `screens` styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use the @layer directive to tell Tailwind which "bucket" a set of custom styles belong to.

properties.name: user-drag
properties.description: Non-standard CSS property for preventing drag behavior on elements

properties.name: -webkit-user-drag
properties.description: WebKit-specific CSS property for preventing drag behavior on elements

properties.name: -moz-user-drag
properties.description: Mozilla-specific CSS property for preventing drag behavior on elements

properties.name: -o-user-drag
properties.description: Opera-specific CSS property for preventing drag behavior on elements

properties.name: -khtml-user-drag
properties.description: KHTML-specific CSS property for preventing drag behavior on elements
